channel.title: CVE Feed for wptipsntricks -- WP Video Lightbox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wptipsntricks -- WP Video Lightbox

item.title: CVE-2024-4324|2024-08-01T20:40:46.488Z -- wptipsntricks -- wp%20video%20lightbox
item.description: The WP Video Lightbox plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘width’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.10 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4324|2024-06-04T17:56:23.088Z -- wptipsntricks -- wp%20video%20lightbox
item.description: The WP Video Lightbox plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘width’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.10 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
